'''Mystic Offering''' is a [[Crafting Method]] available at [[Crafting Benches]] at [[Adventure Rank]] 45 to perform [[Alchemy]].

Three 5-Star [[Artifacts]] can be sacrificed to obtain an [[Artifact Strongbox]], which contains a random Artifact.
